name: minundy.js
description: Minimal Underscore Template Build System -> min und -> minundy.js. Manages pre-building JS/HTML templates using underscore.js
author: gtzilla <gregory.tomlinson@gmail.com>

scripts.watch: node src/minundy.js --watch watch/folder_a.html  --watch test/html --distro test/js-dist --distro-separate test/js-dist-separate --debug
scripts.alert: terminal-notifier -sender com.googlecode.iterm2 -activate com.googlecode.iterm2 -group minundy -sound default -message "minundy.js exited. Potential error." -title "Yarn Watch"
scripts.watch_alert: yarn watch --only-build &&  yarn watch || yarn alert
